What are the macros in a Hot Pocket?
faqs.a: About 35 g carbs, 10 g fat, 11 g protein, and 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect Hot Pocket calories?
faqs.a: Slightly; microwaving is standard, but oven-baking may concentrate calories due to less water retention.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Hot Pocket?
faqs.a: Around 620 mg per pepperoni Hot Pocket.

faqs.q: Are there lower-calorie Hot Pocket options?
faqs.a: Yes, like the Lean Pockets line, which can be 200-250 kcal depending on flavor.
